info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 19960
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;application-form.france-visas.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 19960
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 3, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;application-form.france-visas.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
application-form.france-visas.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	TXT	"v=DMARC1; p=none; rua=mailto:ivd04g8f@ag.eu.dmarcadvisor.com"

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
fr.	3600	IN	NS	d.nic.fr.
fr.	3600	IN	NS	g.ext.nic.fr.
fr.	3600	IN	NS	f.ext.nic.fr.

info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 55616
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;application-form.france-visas.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 55616
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;application-form.france-visas.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
fr.	600	IN	SOA	a.nic.fr. dnsmaster.afnic.fr. 2241891351 3600 1800 1209600 600

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 6561
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.application-form.france-visas.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 6561
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.application-form.france-visas.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
_dmarc.application-form.france-visas.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	TXT	"v=DMARC1; p=none; rua=mailto:ivd04g8f@ag.eu.dmarcadvisor.com"
